string.name: name
string.value: Weapon Starts a Fight… with His Owner?
As soon as you reach Level 120, #b#p1201000##k strikes up a conversation with you…
#p1201000# alerts you that #p1201002# is acting strange once again and urges you to visit #b#m140000000##k immediately. She also warns that she's never seen it act this way…
#p1201002# seemed to be in great pain. What's going on here?

How is the training going? I know you're busy, but please come to #b#m140000000##k immediately. The #b#p1201002##k has started to act weird again... But it's even weirder now. It's different from before. It's...darker than usual.

I have a bad feeling about this. Please come back here. I've never seen or heard #p1201002#, but I can sense the suffering it's going through. #bOnly you, the master of #p1201002#, can do something about it#k!
I'm not joking! Something is seriously wrong... Something must have happened to #p1201002#!
Aren't you… Aran? What are you doing here? I see… So that cocky little girl brought you here. I warned her not to…
Please, go and take care of #b#p1201002##k! I have a feeling that if you don't go soon, it may be too late!
